nodes.text: Wolffe's Acclamator-class transgalactic military assault ship

Clone Commander Wolffe commanded an Acclamator-class transgalactic military assault ship during the Clone Wars. Some time into the war, the ship transported the 104th Battalion to reinforce Republic forces in the Qiilura system. However, the battalion was redirected to the planet Aleen to carry out a relief mission for the native population after the planet was ravaged by a series of groundquakes.
